Translations.Text: Ane jo ame temana para daya kari'e ane temani takaliphone dura kari da'i'e, to a loko to potana vidrohamam adaga rahi vadhare pathabhrasta thava lagya
ane ame te lokoni pakada yatana dvara kari, to pana a loko potana palanahara same na jhukya ane na to ajiji kari
tyam sudhi ke jyare ame te loko mate sakhata yatanano dvara kholi nakhyo, to te ja samaye tarata ja nirasa tha'i gaya
te allaha che, jene tamara mate kana ane ankho ane hrdaya banavya, parantu tame ghano ocho abhara mano cho
ane te (allaha) ja che, jene tamarum sarjana kari dharati para phelavi didha ane teni ja tarapha tame bhega karavamam avaso
ane a te ja che, je jivita kare che ane mrtyu ape che. Ane rata- divasani pherabadalino vyavasthapaka te ja che, sum tame samajata nathi
parantu te loko'e pana avi ja vata kari, je pahelana loko kaheta avya che
ke sum jyare ame mrtyu pami mati ane hadaka tha'i ja'isum, sum to pana amane uthavavamam avase
amane ane amara purvajone pahelathi ja a vacana apavamam avi rahyum che, kami nahim, a to agalana lokoni varta'o che
pucho to khara ke dharati ane teni badhi vastu'o koni che? Janavo jo janata hoya to
tarata ja javaba apase ke “allaha”. Kahi do ke pachi tame sikhamana kema prapta nathi karata
pucho to khara ke sata akaso ane ghana ja ucca, pratisthita arsano malika kona che
te loko javaba apase ke “allaha” ja che, kahi do ke pachi tame kema nathi darata
savala karo ke dareka vastuno adhikara kona hathamam che? Je sarana ape che ane jeni virud'dha ko'i sarana apanara nathi. Jo tame janata hoya to janavo
a ja javaba apase ke “allaha” ja che, kahi do ke pachi tamara para kyanthi jadu kari devamam ave che
Satyato e che ke ame temani samaksa satya vata pahoncadi didhi ane a loko kharekhara jutha che

na to allaha'e ko'ine dikaro banavyo ane na to teni sathe ko'i pujya che, nahito dareka pujya potana sarjanane la'ine pharato ane dareka ekabija para cadhi besata, je guno a loko janavi rahya che, tenathi allaha pavitra che
te hajara ane adrsya bannene jane che ane je sirka a loko kari rahya che, tenathi te pavitra che
tame du'a karo, he mara palanahara! Tum mane te janava, jenum vacana te lokone karavamam avi rahyum che
he mara palanahara! Tum mane te atyacari'ona juthamam na karisa
ame je kami vacana temane api rahya chi'e, te badhum ja tamane batavi deva kharekhara saksama chi'e
duskarmane te rite dura karo, je kharekhara srestha rita hoya, je kami a loko vato kari rahya che, tene ame sari rite jani'e chi'e
ane du'a karo ke, he mara palanahara! Hum setanana vasavasathi tarum sarana icchum chum
ane he palanahara! Hum tara saranamam avum chum ke te (setana) mari pase avi jaya
tyam sudhi ke jyare temana manthi ko'inum mrtyu avi pahonce che, to kahe che he mara palanahara! Mane pacho (duniyamam) mokali de

ke potani chodeli duniyamam ja'i satkaryo kari la'um, avum kyareya nahim thaya a to phakta eka vata che, je a loko kahi rahya che, temani pachala to eka padado che, temana biji vakhata jivita thava sudhi
basa! Jyare sura phunki devamam avase, te divase na to sambandho rahese, na eka-bijani vatacita
jemana trajavanum paladum bhare hase, te saphala thanara hase
Ane je lokona trajavanum paladum halakum tha'i gayum, a te loko che, jemane potanum nukasana pote ja kari lidhum. Je hammesa mate jahannamavala thaya
temana modha'o para aga salagati rahese ane tyam temana cahera kharaba tha'i jase
sum mari ayato tamari samaksa padhavamam nahati avati? To pana tame tene juthalavata hatam
kahese ke he palanahara! Amari kharabi amara para chava'i ga'i, (kharekhara) ame pathabhrasta ja hatam
he amara palanahara! Amane ahinyathi chutakaro apa, jo haju pana ame avum ja kari'e to, ni:Sanka ame atyacari che
allaha ta'ala kahese ke dhrtkarela ahinya ja padya raho ane mari sathe vata na karo

mara banda'onum eka jutha hatum, je satata evum kaheta rahya ke he amara palanahara! Ame imana lavi cukya, tum amane mapha kari de. Ane amara para daya kara, tum dareka dayavana lokothi sauthi vadhu dayalu che
(parantu) tame teni maskari ja karata rahya, tyam sudhi ke tame mane bhuli gaya ane tame teni sathe maskari ja karata rahya
mem aje temane temani dhirajano badalo api didho che ke te'o chevate saphala tha'i gaya
allaha ta'ala puchase ke tame dharati para varsani ganatari pramane ketlum rahya
te'o kahese ke eka divasa athava eka divasa karata pana ochum, ganatari karanara'one pana puchi lo
allaha ta'ala kahese ke kharekhara tame tyam ghanum ja ochum rahya cho, he kasa! Tame ane pahelathi ja jani leta
sum tame evum mano cho ke ame tamarum sarjana amasta ja karyum che. Ane e ke tame amari tarapha pacha pheravavamam ja nahim avo
allaha ta'ala saco badasaha che, te ghano ja ucca che, tena sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, te ja pratisthita, arsano malika che
Je vyakti allaha sathe ko'i bija pujyane pokare, jeno ko'i puravo temani pase nathi, basa! Teno hisaba to tena palanahara pase ja che, ni:Sanka inkara karanara'one chutakaro nahim male
ane kahi do ke he mara palanahara! Tum mane mapha kari de ane mara para daya kara ane tum sau dayavana karata vadhu dayalu che
